name: An Adventure*
description:
*If you consider walking simulators adventures...

A jam entry for the Retro Revamp 2022 Jam. I chose to "revamp" Adventure 2600, something that was relatively simple because this was also my first Unity + VR project and I didn't want to overwhelm myself. Even though I say simple, because of my lack of knowledge, I wasn't even able to implement the dragon enemies /sad sigh

Anyhow I learned a lot and this was a good start for dipping my toes into vr before doing a more ambitious game project.

Made for Quest 2 in mind. I would recommend using sidequest to install.

Credits:

Art/Models/Music by Me.

Skybox Texture, a modified version of these skybox textures.

Hand model from the VRIF toolkit.

Made using Unity + VRIF toolkit.
